short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: List recent bookmarks in a toolbar menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a very simple extension that lists the most recent bookmarks. Each bookmark is labelled with it's parent folder name. At the bottom are buttons to quickly move a bookmark to an "Archive" folder or to delete the bookmark.

In the options page, you can toggle grouping bookmarks by date, or hide the bottom toolbar.

https://github.com/Zren/RecentBookmarksPopup
